features.name: Expense Tracking
features.description: Track your expenses effortlessly with our intuitive interface. Stay on top of your spending habits and gain insights to make informed financial decisions.

features.name: Savings Goal Setting
features.description: Set and achieve your financial goals with ease. Whether it's saving for a vacation, a new car, or retirement, our app helps you stay motivated and focused.

features.name: Investment Portfolio Management
features.description: Manage your investments like a pro. Monitor your portfolio's performance, diversify your assets, and stay informed about market trends .

features.name: Budgeting Tools
features.description: Create personalized budgets and take control of your finances. Our budgeting tools make it easy to allocate funds, track expenses.

features.name: Bill Reminders
features.description: Never miss a payment deadline again. Receive timely reminders for upcoming bills and subscriptions, ensuring that you stay organized and avoid late fees.

features.name: Customizable Reports
features.description: Gain valuable insights into your financial health. Generate customizable reports that visualize your spending patterns, savings progress, and investment performance.
